full_sentence: White races are higher quality stock than black

full_sentence: the great part about voat is that when someone calls you racist, you just say 'so?' and move on with your life. the word racist holds no power here. or if you are like me, you have a little fun with it.

full_sentence: I already have two white kidsof my own, and just to get his goat I told him I wanted to make asian half breeds (I do. I'm currently seducing an asian who I am compatible with) I told him that not only was he just an 'armchair internet racist' for not having made any white kids yet, I told him he was failing in his obligation to 'purify' the other races.

full_sentence: I also brought up how I would be cucking asians, and therefore could not be a cuck. It was loads of fun. Racist people are so easy to walk in circles.

full_sentence: edit: for the record, I am racist. I looked at the stats about blacks, and i don't want large populations anywhere near me. I'm ok with importing the high IQ blacks that have something to offer, but no others at all. If we did that, there wouldn't even be racial tension.
